Package info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.transformation.rules

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddArrayRule
    Add empty array to specified field
    AddGuidRule
    Rule generates and inserts guid into specified field.
    AddNumericGuidRule
    Rule generates and inserts numeric guid into specified field.
    CollectObjectRule
    Rule that create list and collect objects in message.
    ComposeRule
    Rule that merge some feilds and write it in origin object.
    ConcatStringsRule  
    CopyFieldRule
    Rule copying value from one field of object to another one.
    CopyFieldsRule
    Rule copying values from some fields of object to another Parameters: - fields - array with fields from and to, contains objects with: - from - name of field where from to copy a value.
    DecomposeRule
    Rule that decompose all inner fields.
    DeleteFieldRule
    Rule that deletes some concrete field.
    EqualsQueryCreationRule
    Rule which creates query with equals statement for DB actor
    FillArrayRule
    Fill array rule into specified field from another specified field
    FindArrayItemRule
    Transformation rule that searches for first item matching some predicate in array of objects and places it into another field.
    FindInQueryCreationRule
    Rule prepares data for search query with "IN" construction.
    InsertFieldRule
    The rule inserts value in certain field
    ObjectUpdateRule
    Rule updating an object stored on server from data received from client.
    SearchQueryGenerateRule  
    SubStringRule
    Rule which makes substring
    TrimStringRule
